contentList.content: The silver of this ring is tarnished with age, but its glittering gemstone glows with an alluring magenta aura that compels your eyes to stare and behold it.

Once per long rest, this ring's potent aura of death will cause the wearer's next victim to rise again as an <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="ENTHRALLED_CORPSE_NECRO">Enthralled Corpse</LSTag> if it dies while <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hexed</LSTag>.
Your necrotic potency has been spent and depleted until completing a long rest.

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hex</LSTag> has marked this enemy with an unholy curse that will cause it to rise again once defeated, and serve you until you complete your next long rest.
Inflicted with a curse by your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_Hex">Hex</LSTag>, this mindless undead will serve you until your next long rest.
A coldness clings to this macabre circlet, like the chill of a grave.
These arcane gloves are engraved with the initials 'I.T.'.
These boots are imbuded with the unholy powers of undeath.
A malicious hum of magic wafts off this glowing chest.
